articles.content:
India and Pakistan are gearing up for another face-off in the Asia Cup 2023 after last week’s rain-abandoned affair.
The arch-rivals will square off in the Super-4 stage on Sunday (September 10) in … [+1282 chars]

articles.description: The moment came in the deciding third set with Bopanna and Ebden trailing the set 2-4 and the game 0-15. The chair umpire gave the point to the Indian
